pages.text: The $(item)Tunneler$() is a basic multiblock. It is used to accelerate items through layers of essence and let them absorb the fitting aspects. $(br2)In order to 'tunnel' an item, $(item)Matter Acceleration Modules$() must be placed in the Tunneler.

These will be consumed after the process.$(br)Then, the reagent is placed in the tunneler. The essences used are placed in three $(marked)Filter Holders$(). After the item has been accelerated, it will be placed on a pedestal (see multiblock).

If the crafting process was not successful because the reactant was wrong, the essences won't get consumed. If the catalyst had possibilites, but the essences were not the correct ones, the correct essences will get consumed. $(br)(Note that the machine needs to get a redstone signal).
